entry.name: swipeleft
entry.title: swipeleft
entry.desc: Triggered when a swipe event occurs moving in the left direction.

longdesc.p: Triggered when a horizontal drag of 30px or more (and less than 75px vertically) occurs within 1 second duration in the left direction. See the swipe event entry for more detailed information on the swipe event.
